name: Windows Live Photo Gallery Information File
summary: Learn about .PD4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: By default, PD4 files use the name Pictures.pd4 and are stored in the following directory: %USERPROFILE%\​AppData\​Local\​Microsoft\​Windows Live Photo Gallery
If a PD4 file database is corrupted, you may rename the existing PD4 file to OLD_Pictures.pd4 and Windows Live Photo Gallery will recreate the database.
NOTE: Microsoft Windows Live Photo Gallery is no longer developed.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
